basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: Dental Lab Technician | Digital Dentistry | Former Lead Dental Assistant
basics.summary: Detail-oriented dental professional with over a decade of experience in both clinical and laboratory settings. Skilled in digital dentistry workflows, dental anatomy, impression taking, and working with lab materials and tools. Experienced in CAD/CAM systems, 3D printing, and hands-on lab work such as processing, investing, and model work. A collaborative team player with proven ability to balance precision, efficiency, and patient-focused results.

work.name: Premier Dental Lab
highlights: Implemented CAD/CAM systems, 3D printing, and milling workflows for crowns, bridges, and implant restorations
Processed impressions, created digital models, and ensured precision in restoration fabrication
Maintained lab equipment and trained staff on proper use of digital tools
Collaborated with dentists and technicians to meet high-quality restoration standards

work.name: Gray Station Dental
highlights: Worked chairside with dentists to support a wide range of restorative and surgical procedures
Prepared and articulated impressions, models, and temporaries according to prescriptions
Trained and supervised a team of 3 assistants, ensuring efficiency and compliance with standards
Maintained sterilization protocols, lab equipment, and patient records

work.name: Unbound Digital
highlights: Managed client-facing IT projects including server migrations and Microsoft 365 transitions
Led Help Desk support team of 5 technicians

work.name: Most Recent Roles (IT/Software)
highlights: Worked in IT and software development roles, gaining strong attention to detail and technical problem-solving skills
Experience in highly regulated, client-facing environments where accuracy and documentation were critical
